name: tm36
effect: Teaches Sludge Bomb to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sludge Bomb to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Selfdestruct)

flavor_text.sun_moon: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
